overview: The year is 4044. As the battle between the blood-thirsty Illuminati forces and the human resistance rages on, Tickles The Clown - a.k.a. the Mauler Of Innocents - escapes the Gag and Tag prison camp and joins the Illuminati forces. Hold your screams. In space no one can hear you laugh.
tagline: In Space No One Can Hear You Laugh.
title: Tickles the Clown
